about_the_game:
Overview

Reborn merges elements from three genres: Idle, Roguelike, and RPG, but is not fully defined by any one of them. The game mostly plays in the background, encouraging you to check in periodically to level up stats, manage inventory, take on quests, craft gear and potions, or simply get to know the villagers. Designed to be enjoyed over several months, Reborn lets you witness your character's growth as time passes.

To be clear, Reborn isn’t for everyone. If you're after an action-packed, hands-on experience, this may not be your ideal game. Though there are plenty of tasks and challenges, much of the game is spent passively as your character auto-battles through endless waves of creatures. The core challenge lies in planning and customizing your character’s build, gathering resources and experience, and completing tasks around the village.

Key Features

  • Idle Gameplay: Let the game run while you focus on key moments of decision. Check in periodically to fine-tune your build, manage resources, and complete quests.

  • Roguelike Experience: Death is part of the cycle. Your Reborn character will die frequently, losing some items not equipped or held, but retaining the experience gained. This allows you to come back stronger and push further each time.

  • RPG Elements: With 20 unique NPCs whose lives you can shape, the village offers deep stories that develop as you help them. Your character’s growth comes from balancing six core stats, discovering permanent buffs, and experimenting with different builds, all while battling increasingly tough creatures with their own unique strengths.

Unique Features

  • Vibrant Village Life: Immerse yourself in the stories and relationships of a village full of distinct NPCs. Complete quests to influence their lives and grow stronger through their rewards.

  • Potion Brewing, Gear Crafting, and Enchanting: Fine-tune your build by brewing stat-boosting potions and crafting powerful gear that can be enhanced and enchanted.

  • (To Come) Farming and Companions: Soon, you'll be able to grow your own resources and recruit helpful creatures to join you on your journey.

Join Our Community - 

Join our Discord community to share your thoughts and contribute to its development. Your feedback is crucial in shaping the game's future. Whether you're a veteran gamer or new to the scene, your insights are invaluable. Let's work together to create something amazing in Reborn!

short_description: Reborn is an idle roguelike RPG where you guide a Reborn warrior through endless waves of creatures in an evolving village. Balance six core stats, craft gear, brew potions, and help unique villagers with quests. Watch your character grow as you manage resources and shape the world around you.
